```{r}
df <- read.csv("complete.csv")
df$stage <-factor(df$stage)
df
```

```{r}
library(mgcv)
df <- df[!is.na(df$dist_search),]
df <- gam(dist_search ~ s(stage), data = df, method = "REML")
df
```
